item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, January 9, 2025 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:

3. Cracking a 512-bit DKIM key for less than $8 in the cloud (639 points | 306 comments)

12. Bringing SerenityOS to real hardware, one driver at a time (214 points | 80 comments)
13. Steve Langasek, one of Ubuntu Linux's leading lights, has died (155 points | 12 comments)
14. 28h Days: year 1 update (132 points | 78 comments)
15. Who killed the rave? (268 points | 677 comments)

20. Robotics 101 at UMich: Applied numerical linear algebra as intro linear algebra (200 points | 49 comments)
21. How many real numbers exist? New proof moves closer to an answer (2021) (44 points | 26 comments)
22. You don't have to pay the Microsoft 365 price increase (261 points | 119 comments)
23. A Pixel Parable (97 points | 10 comments)

27. Learning Synths (307 points | 103 comments)
28. Gate-level simulation of ASIC in browser (188 points | 25 comments)
29. Salesforce will hire no more software engineers in 2025, says Marc Benioff (271 points | 307 comments)
30. Some programming language ideas (121 points | 116 comments)
